mysqlQuery: select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('amount',amount,'credit_arrangement_name',credit_arrangement_name,'status',status,'notes',notes,'currency_code',currency_code,'credit_arrangement_comment',credit_arrangement_comment,'start_date',start_date,'end_date',end_date,'approval_date',approval_date)) as actualDBResult from(select amount, credit_arrangement_name, status, notes, currency_code, credit_arrangement_comment, start_date, end_date, approval_date from testground.credit_arrangement where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044') A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('mambu_loan_id',mambu_loan_id,'mambu_loan_parent_id',mambu_loan_parent_id,'credit_arrangement_identifier',credit_arrangement_identifier,'state',state,'notes',notes,'is_deleted',is_deleted,'transferout_amount',transferout_amount)) as actualDBResult from(select mambu_loan_id,mambu_loan_parent_id,credit_arrangement_identifier,state,notes,is_deleted,transferout_amount from testground.ln_mambu_abacus_migration where credit_arrangement_identifier='WUI044') A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('product_identifier',product_identifier,'loan_type',loan_type,'currency_code',currency_code,'loan_group',loan_group,'loan_relationship_manager',loan_relationship_manager,'loan_amount',loan_amount,'loan_term_value',loan_term_value,'loan_term_frequency_type',loan_term_frequency_type,'account_open_date',account_open_date,'repayment_date_method',repayment_date_method,'first_repayment_date',first_repayment_date,'last_repayment_date',last_repayment_date,'interest_calculation_method',interest_calculation_method,'repayment_allocation_order',repayment_allocation_order,'payment_allocation_method',payment_allocation_method,'prepayment_strategy',prepayment_strategy,'account_status',account_status,'loan_comment',loan_comment,'account_substatus',account_substatus,'disbursement_payment_method',disbursement_payment_method,'external_id',external_id,'approved_principal',approved_principal,'locked_date',locked_date,'expected_maturity_date',expected_maturity_date,'actual_matured_date',actual_matured_date,'loan_closed_date',loan_closed_date,'penalty_rate',penalty_rate,'follows_custom_schedule',follows_custom_schedule,'locked_option',locked_option,'topup_limit',topup_limit,'revolving_topup_limit',revolving_topup_limit,'number_of_topups_allowed',number_of_topups_allowed,'topup_limit_utilised',topup_limit_utilised,'days_in_month_type',days_in_month_type,'days_in_year_type',days_in_year_type,'stop_fee_amortization',stop_fee_amortization,'repayment_grace_period',repayment_grace_period,'repayment_grace_period_type',repayment_grace_period_type,'committed_amount',committed_amount,'uncommitted_amount',uncommitted_amount,'nad_amount',nad_amount,'drawdown_preference',drawdown_preference,'nad_type',nad_type,'capitalize_interest_to_nad',capitalize_interest_to_nad,'capitalize_fee_to_nad',capitalize_fee_to_nad,'capitalize_penalty_to_nad',capitalize_penalty_to_nad,'parent_loan_account',parent_loan_account,'version',version,'rescheduled_account',rescheduled_account,'is_this_parent_account',is_this_parent_account,'ultimate_parent_account',ultimate_parent_account,'active_parent_account',active_parent_account,'active_loan_facility_amount',active_loan_facility_amount,'loan_category',loan_category,'cash_collateral_int_bearing',cash_collateral_int_bearing,'rentained_interest_int_bearing',rentained_interest_int_bearing,'rent_income_int_bearing',rent_income_int_bearing,'loan_name',loan_name,'time_travel_loan',time_travel_loan,'loan_creation_type',loan_creation_type,'redraw_amount',redraw_amount,'is_holiday_enabled',is_holiday_enabled,'external_source',external_source)) as actualDBResult from(select product_identifier, loan_type, currency_code, loan_group, loan_relationship_manager,loan_amount, loan_term_value, loan_term_frequency_type, account_open_date, repayment_date_method, first_repayment_date, last_repayment_date, interest_calculation_method, repayment_allocation_order, payment_allocation_method, prepayment_strategy, account_status, loan_comment, account_substatus, disbursement_payment_method, external_id, approved_principal, locked_date, expected_maturity_date, actual_matured_date, loan_closed_date, penalty_rate, follows_custom_schedule, repayment_grace_period_type, committed_amount, uncommitted_amount, nad_amount, drawdown_preference, nad_type, capitalize_interest_to_nad, capitalize_fee_to_nad, capitalize_penalty_to_nad, rentained_interest_int_bearing, rent_income_int_bearing, loan_name, time_travel_loan, loan_creation_type, redraw_amount, is_holiday_enabled, external_source from testground.ln_loan_account where id in( SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('sequence_number',sequence_number,'liability_percentage',liability_percentage,'created_by',created_by)) as actualDBResult from(select sequence_number, liability_percentage, created_by from testground.ln_borrower_details where loan_id in(select loan_id from testground.ln_borrower_details where member_id IN (select customer_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('a_type',a_type,'given_name',given_name,'middle_name',middle_name,'surname',surname,'date_of_birth',date_of_birth,'account_beneficiary',account_beneficiary,'reference_customer',reference_customer,'assigned_office',assigned_office,'assigned_employee',assigned_employee,'current_state',current_state,'created_by',created_by,'is_member',is_member,'crm_customer_status',crm_customer_status,'customer_title',customer_title,'organization_name',organization_name,'occupation',occupation,'legal_status',legal_status,'business_status',business_status,'sic_code_type',sic_code_type,'sic_code',sic_code,'external_source',external_source)) as actualDBResult from(select a_type, given_name, middle_name,surname, date_of_birth, account_beneficiary, reference_customer, assigned_office, assigned_employee, current_state, created_by, is_member, crm_customer_status, customer_title, organization_name, occupation, legal_status,business_status, sic_code_type, sic_code, external_source from testground.maat_customers where id in (select customer_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('a_type',a_type,'a_group',a_group,'a_value',a_value,'preference_level',preference_level,'validated',validated)) as actualDBResult from(select a_type, a_group, a_value, preference_level, validated from testground.maat_contact_details where customer_id in(select customer_id from testground.credit_arrangement where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044')ORDER BY a_type DESC LIMIT 4) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('street',street,'street2',street2,'city',city,'postal_code',postal_code,'region',region,'country_code',country_code,'country',country)) as actualDBResult from(select street, street2, city, postal_code, region, country_code, country from testground.maat_addresses where customer_id in(select customer_id from testground.credit_arrangement where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044')) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('next_rate_reset_date',next_rate_reset_date,'undrawn_balance',undrawn_balance,'retained_interest_advance',retained_interest_advance,'rent_income_advance_amt',rent_income_advance_amt,'retained_interest_utilized',retained_interest_utilized,'rent_income_utilized',rent_income_utilized,'cash_collateral_advance',cash_collateral_advance,'cash_collateral_utilized',cash_collateral_utilized,'excess_pay_advance',excess_pay_advance,'excess_pay_utilized',excess_pay_utilized,'last_disbursed_date',last_disbursed_date,'total_fee_paid',total_fee_paid,'total_penalty_paid',total_penalty_paid,'total_paid',total_paid,'fee_balance',fee_balance)) as actualDBResult from(select next_rate_reset_date, undrawn_balance, retained_interest_advance, rent_income_advance_amt, retained_interest_utilized, rent_income_utilized, cash_collateral_advance, cash_collateral_utilized, excess_pay_advance, excess_pay_utilized, last_disbursed_date, total_fee_paid, total_penalty_paid, total_paid, fee_balance from testground.ln_loan_balances where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('last_rate_reset_date',last_rate_reset_date,'total_principal_paid',total_principal_paid,'total_interest_paid',total_interest_paid,'total_interest_rolledup',total_interest_rolledup,'outstanding_balance',outstanding_balance,'accrued_interest',accrued_interest,'accrued_interest_booked',accrued_interest_booked,'overdue_interest',overdue_interest,'interest_due',interest_due,'interest_accrued_not_paid',interest_accrued_not_paid,'penalty_due',penalty_due,'penalty_accrued_not_paid',penalty_accrued_not_paid,'reversed',reversed)) as actualDBResult from(select last_rate_reset_date, total_principal_paid, total_interest_paid, total_interest_rolledup, outstanding_balance, accrued_interest, accrued_interest_booked, overdue_interest, interest_due, interest_accrued_not_paid, penalty_due, penalty_accrued_not_paid, reversed from testground.ln_tranche_transfer  where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('actual_disbursed_principal',actual_disbursed_principal,'actual_disbursed_date',actual_disbursed_date,'total_principal_paid',total_principal_paid,'total_interest_paid',total_interest_paid,'total_penalty_paid',total_penalty_paid,'total_paid',total_paid,'principal_balance',principal_balance,'accrued_interest',accrued_interest,'accrued_interest_booked',accrued_interest_booked,'penalty_int_accr',penalty_int_accr,'penalty_int_accr_booked',penalty_int_accr_booked,'interest_rollup_amount',interest_rollup_amount,'last_interest_applied_date',last_interest_applied_date)) as actualDBResult from(select actual_disbursed_principal, actual_disbursed_date, total_principal_paid, total_interest_paid, total_penalty_paid, total_paid, principal_balance, accrued_interest, accrued_interest_booked, penalty_int_accr, penalty_int_accr_booked, interest_rollup_amount, last_interest_applied_date from testground.ln_tranche_balances where loan_id in (SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('total_disbursed_principal',total_disbursed_principal,'cash_collateral_amount',cash_collateral_amount,'retained_interest_amount',retained_interest_amount,'excess_pay_amount',excess_pay_amount,'make_whole_fee_collected',make_whole_fee_collected,'old_loan_status',old_loan_status,'post_validation_status',post_validation_status,'remarks',remarks,'reversed',reversed,'next_rate_reset_date',next_rate_reset_date)) as actualDBResult from(select total_disbursed_principal, cash_collateral_amount,retained_interest_amount, excess_pay_amount, make_whole_fee_collected, old_loan_status, post_validation_status, remarks, reversed, next_rate_reset_date from testground.ln_loan_transfer where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('floating_rate_key_id',floating_rate_key_id,'business_date',business_date,'rate_date',rate_date,'fixed_rate',fixed_rate,'spread_rate',spread_rate,'actual_ref_rate',actual_ref_rate,'adjusted_ref_rate',adjusted_ref_rate,'all_in_one_rate',all_in_one_rate,'event_type',event_type,'deleted',deleted)) as actualDBResult from(select floating_rate_key_id, business_date, rate_date, fixed_rate, spread_rate, actual_ref_rate, adjusted_ref_rate, all_in_one_rate, event_type, deleted from testground.ln_loan_reference_rate_history where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('model_number',model_number,'period_number',period_number,'installment_date',installment_date,'from_date',from_date,'due_date',due_date,'principal_due',principal_due,'principal_paid',principal_paid,'outstanding_loan_balance',outstanding_loan_balance,'interest_due',interest_due,'interest_accrued',interest_accrued,'interest_paid',interest_paid,'capitalized_interest',capitalized_interest,'interest_due_for_ipd',interest_due_for_ipd,'interest_accrued_for_ipd',interest_accrued_for_ipd,'penalty_due',penalty_due,'penalty_paid',penalty_paid,'total_due',total_due,'payment_date',payment_date,'overdue_amount',overdue_amount,'is_completed',is_completed,'fee_capitalised',fee_capitalised,'manually_capitalized_interest',manually_capitalized_interest,'penalty_interest_capitalised',penalty_interest_capitalised,'pay_by_date',pay_by_date,'grace_upto_date',grace_upto_date)) as actualDBResult from(select model_number,period_number,installment_date,from_date,due_date,principal_due,principal_paid,outstanding_loan_balance,interest_due,interest_accrued,interest_paid,capitalized_interest,interest_due_for_ipd,interest_accrued_for_ipd,penalty_due,penalty_paid,total_due,payment_date,overdue_amount,is_completed,fee_capitalised,manually_capitalized_interest,penalty_interest_capitalised, pay_by_date,grace_upto_date from testground.ln_loan_schedule_repayment_period where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044')))A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('period_number',period_number,'period_frequency_value',period_frequency_value,'period_frequency_type',period_frequency_type,'calculation_method',calculation_method,'principal_repay_frequency_value',principal_repay_frequency_value,'principal_repay_frequency_type',principal_repay_frequency_type,'interest_repay_frequency_value',interest_repay_frequency_value,'interest_repay_frequency_type',interest_repay_frequency_type,'outstanding_interest_repay_method',outstanding_interest_repay_method,'compounding_frequency_type',compounding_frequency_type,'compounding_frequency_value',compounding_frequency_value,'interest_rate_type',interest_rate_type,'interest_key',interest_key,'ref_floor_rate',ref_floor_rate,'ref_cap_rate',ref_cap_rate,'interest_rate',interest_rate,'interest_repricing_frequency_value',interest_repricing_frequency_value,'interest_repricing_frequency_type',interest_repricing_frequency_type,'interest_repricing_method',interest_repricing_method,'first_rate_reset_date',first_rate_reset_date,'principal_amount',principal_amount,'principal_for_period',principal_for_period,'initial_principal',initial_principal,'balloon_amount',balloon_amount,'outstanding_principal',outstanding_principal,'installment_amount',installment_amount,'gn_or_ipr',gn_or_ipr,'fix_balloon',fix_balloon,'fix_principal_or_installment',fix_principal_or_installment,'is_last_period',is_last_period)) principal_repay_frequency_type,interest_repay_frequency_value,interest_repay_frequency_type,outstanding_interest_repay_method,compounding_frequency_type,compounding_frequency_value,interest_rate_type,interest_key,ref_floor_rate,ref_cap_rate,interest_rate,interest_repricing_frequency_value,interest_repricing_frequency_type,interest_repricing_method,first_rate_reset_date,principal_amount,principal_for_period,initial_principal,balloon_amount,outstanding_principal,installment_amount,gn_or_ipr,fix_balloon,fix_principal_or_installment,is_last_period testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('committed_drawn_amount',committed_drawn_amount,'committed_undrawn_amount',committed_undrawn_amount,'uncommitted_drawn_amount',uncommitted_drawn_amount,'uncommitted_undrawn_amount',uncommitted_undrawn_amount,'nad_utilized_amount',nad_utilized_amount,'nad_unutilized_amount',nad_unutilized_amount,'committed_redraw_amount',committed_redraw_amount,'uncommitted_redraw_amount',uncommitted_redraw_amount,'nad_redraw_amount',nad_redraw_amount,'total_undrawn_amount',total_undrawn_amount,'total_drawn_amount',total_drawn_amount)) as actualDBResult from(select committed_drawn_amount,committed_undrawn_amount,uncommitted_drawn_amount,uncommitted_undrawn_amount,nad_utilized_amount,nad_unutilized_amount,committed_redraw_amount,uncommitted_redraw_amount,nad_redraw_amount,total_undrawn_amount,total_drawn_amount from testground.ln_loan_drawn_balances where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('effective_interest_rate',effective_interest_rate,'eir_cashflow_ref_id',eir_cashflow_ref_id,'sppi',sppi,'bm',bm,'provision_stage',provision_stage,'last_ecl_run_date',last_ecl_run_date,'last_ecl_run_time',last_ecl_run_time,'next_ecl_date',next_ecl_date,'measurement',measurement,'return_on_investment',return_on_investment,'classification_remarks',classification_remarks,'parameter_remarks',parameter_remarks,'unamortised_fees',unamortised_fees,'accrued_fees',accrued_fees,'unamortised_modification_gain_loss',unamortised_modification_gain_loss,'version',version)) as actualDBResult from(select effective_interest_rate,eir_cashflow_ref_id,sppi,bm,provision_stage,last_ecl_run_date,last_ecl_run_time,next_ecl_date,measurement,return_on_investment,classification_remarks,parameter_remarks,unamortised_fees,accrued_fees,unamortised_modification_gain_loss,version from testground.ln_loan_finance_risk where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select  JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('year',year,'loss_given_default',loss_given_default,'probability_of_default',probability_of_default)) as actualDBResult from(select year, loss_given_default, probability_of_default from testground.ln_loan_finance_risk_pd_lgd where finance_risk_id in (select id from testground.ln_loan_finance_risk where loan_id IN(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044')))) A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('disbursement_sequence_number',disbursement_sequence_number,'disbursement_amount',disbursement_amount,'disbursement_date',disbursement_date,'actual_disbursement_amount',actual_disbursement_amount,'actual_disbursement_date',actual_disbursement_date,'status',status,'unplanned',unplanned,'del_flag',del_flag,'is_migrated',is_migrated)) as actualDBResult from(select disbursement_sequence_number,disbursement_amount,disbursement_date,availability_date,actual_disbursement_amount,actual_disbursement_date,status,unplanned,del_flag,is_migrated from testground.ln_disbursement_schedule where loan_id in(SELECT loan_account_id FROM testground.credit_arrangement_loan_mapping WHERE credit_arrangement_id IN (select credit_arrangement_id from testground.credit_arrangement  where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044'))) A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('summary',summary,'linked_to',linked_to,'linked_to_id',linked_to_id,'description',description,'status',status,'due_Date',due_Date,'close_date',close_date,'cust_identifier',cust_identifier)) as actualDBResult from(select summary, linked_to, linked_to_id, description, status, due_Date, close_date, cust_identifier from testground.tsk_task where linked_to_id in(select identifier from testground.maat_customers where id in(select customer_id from testground.credit_arrangement where credit_arrangement_name='WUI044') )) A;

select JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT('period_number',period_number,'installment_date',installment_date,'principal_due',principal_due,'ul_installment_date',ul_installment_date,'ul_principal_due',ul_principal_due,'ul_period_number',ul_period_number,'interest_period',interest_period,'period_status',period_status,'model_id',model_id)) as actualDBResult from(select period_number,installment_date,principal_due,ul_installment_date,ul_principal_due, ul_period_number, interest_period, period_status, model_id, status from testground.ln_bsp_loan_model_period where loan_model_id in(select id from testground.ln_loan_model where loan_id in (select abacus_loan_id from testground.ln_mambu_abacus_migration where mambu_loan_id='1027000178'))ORDER BY period_number DESC LIMIT 60) A;
